channel.title: Help me fast guys,please
channel.description:
Hellou guys.
can u help me? I dont know how to make runserver.bat for Windows 7. can help me?

item.title: Help me fast guys,please
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

[quote=“mostwanted8, post:2, topic:443085”]@echo off COLOR 0A title (Server name) "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_32\bin\java.exe" -Xmx600m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
i use this code and it works[/quote]

His java path may be different. So OP keep that in mind.

Read full topic
